summary: Mutes breath sound when sprinting,stamina depleted,zooming with bow
descriptionHtml:
Been looking around for this for a while now!
Finally my friend told me he found it on steam workshop, sent it to me, i thought it was from nexus but it isn\'t anywhere on here.

\'\'I\'ve now gotten permission from author;
tundrowalker  [author] 10 hours ago 
I don\'t mind you reposting. You gave me credit in your nexus post, and that\'s really all I\'d ask for\'\'

Mutes breath sound when sprinting
Mutes breath when stamina depleted
Mutes breath when zooming with bow

Instruction included in archive(manual install, very simple)
Putting this up here so that others can enjoy aswell, No use in asking me for optional versions as i\'ve no clue to how this is done.

All credits goes to tundrowalker;http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197996031175/myworkshopfiles/?72850
author: tundrowalker
